attributes.action: Contractual notice to be paid when on maternity leave.
attributes.additional_details:
Currently furloughed employees who are not working will be paid full contractual notice when made redundant. 
Employees who are not working due to maternity leave are not entitled to this
attributes.background:
Change the legislation to allow people on maternity leave to be paid their full contractual
Notice when made redundant.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Women on maternity leave are entitled to notice pay, you can find out more here:

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/work/leaving-a-job/redundancy/redundancy-notice-period/

https://www.maternityaction.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/Redundancy-during-pregnancy-and-maternity-leave-2017-1.pdf
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
